name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Warstic Bonesaber Hybrid BBCOR Baseball Bat, a top-tier choice for players seeking precision and power. This bat boasts a balanced swing feel, thanks to its innovative 2-piece hybrid construction featuring a composite handle and a Katana2X alloy barrel. The 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter is designed to maximize the sweet spot and enhance whip through the zone, while the Featherlite Aerophite Cap ensures increased swing speed. With the Pommel Precision Knob offering pro-style comfort and control, and the Tsuka Pro-Tact Grip providing superior tackiness and cushioning, this black and cream beauty is BBCOR certified and ready to elevate your game. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 273 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
